thread.title: Kansas universities prepare for law allowing guns on campus
thread.title_full: Kansas universities prepare for law allowing guns on campus - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Kansas universities prepare for law allowing guns on campus
text: TOPEKA, Kan. (AP) - A mass shooting at an Oregon college earlier this month has added urgency for Kansas universities that are studying ways to implement a new law that allows most people to carry concealed guns on campus without a permit. The Personal and Family Protection Act, approved in ... ...
